title: Mass Appeal
text:
Email 0 
It’s official. King of Mass Ravi Teja will be seen in director Venu Sriram’s next, Yevado Okadu. Starring alongside him will be Anupama Parameswaran, Prakash Raj and Rao Ramesh. The action-entertainer, which is likely to go on floors this week, will be produced by Dil Raju. comments powered by Disqus
